name: Gargantuan Burger
description: A pound of 100% real beef and the freshest premium toppings on warm, toasted buns.

name: BBQ Ranch Chicken Salad (Full Size)
description: Taste big flavor that truly stands alone with fire-roasted corn, Applewood Smoked Bacon, warm grilled chicken, diced tomatoes and Marzetti® Simply Dressed® BBQ Ranch Dressing.

name: Apple Walnut Chicken Salad (Full Size)
description: Sink your fork into crispy hand-picked red and green apples, roasted pecans, sweet dried cranberries and real blue cheese crumbles. Then we add tender grilled chicken and pomegranate vinaigrette dressing to the mix for a sweet combination, perfect for any meal.

name: Vegan Lettuce Wrap
description: Tofu lettuce wrap with tomatoes, avocado, and bean sprouts.

name: Burrito Bowl
description: It's a burrito, but in a bowl!
